name: Portal Hopper
description:
This is a solo submission for the game jam I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game, made in a week. 

Hop through portals to different universes in search of materials to build your space cruiser. Explore up to 5 different universes to get stuff for your space cruiser.  Your portal gun needs time to charge up and each portal uses 20% power. 

Controls

Space to jump, Left Click to shoot, Right Click to shoot a portal.
